description: The suspects posed as officers and robbed victims after checking their lockdown papers, police say.
title: Coronavirus: Theft suspects tried in France over fake police checks
title_page: Coronavirus: Theft suspects tried in France over fake police checks - BBC News
maintext: The coronavirus outbreak has been linked to about 25,000 deaths in France. But with falling numbers of new fatalities and cases, the government has announced plans to lift some restrictions from 11 May.
